## ContainerNodeBaseClass.at() method

Retrieve the item at the given index in the current node. For most node types this will be trivially implemented as `this.value[index]`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
at(index: number | string): ComponentValue | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number \| string |  |

**Returns:**

[ComponentValue](./css-parser-algorithms.componentvalue.md) \| undefined
